src:
Vd:arna i statens doldisbolag lyfter i löneligan
Den som är vd för ett av statens mycket små eller okända bolag har ibland lön som brädar den bäst betalda generaldirektören. Dessutom ökar deras löner avsevärt snabbare än tjänstemännens.
06 Nov 2019, 20:05 by Jesper Mothander

text:
The CEOs of the state's concealed carry company raise in the payroll
Anyone who is the CEO of one of the state's very small or unknown companies sometimes has salaries that bring down the best-paid director general. In addition, their wages increase significantly faster than those of officials.
06 Nov 2019, 20:05 by Jesper Mothander
